text: 17.27: Lo 32.8; Sng 145.18; Ais 55.6; Jer 23.23; FG 14.17; Ro 1.20Fhe Bakɨme guma ga muuŋgiap, ana khueŋ vuzvugi, gumgi gu mbigi, mbe taagi ana han zɨv, guigira ana kaŋgirga, ana ne vuzvugi. Ana ne vuzvugiap, mbe ndi tɨgi, mbe kɨv vhɨra ana suaŋv ganɨnga. Ana vhɨra, ana nza thav saman ki fhuvara.
